import React, { useState } from 'react' import OtpInput from 'react-otp-input' export default function Otp() { const [otp, setOtp] = useState(2) const inputHandler = (input) => { console.log('inputName', input.target.name) const inputName = input.target.name const inputValue = input.target.value console.log('inputs;', inputName, inputValue) setOtp(input.target.value) } return (
